name: Amazon Guide
yoast_head:
<!-- This site is optimized with the Yoast SEO plugin v23.4 - https://yoast.com/wordpress/plugins/seo/ -->
<title>Amazon Guide for Beginners | Ultimate Amazon Strategies | Digital Marketing Blog with EZ Rankings- Stay Tuned</title>
<meta name="robots" content="index, follow, max-snippet:-1, max-image-preview:large, max-video-preview:-1" />
<meta property="og:locale" content="en_US" />
<meta property="og:type" content="article" />
<meta property="og:title" content="Amazon Guide for Beginners | Ultimate Amazon Strategies | Digital Marketing Blog with EZ Rankings- Stay Tuned" />
<meta property="og:description" content="Here are beginner's guides to Listing, selling & product optimization, keyword research, SEO, PPC, Social Media, Content strategies, Reviews, and more on Amazon." />
<meta property="og:url" content="/blog/category/amazon-guide/" />
<meta property="og:site_name" content="Digital Marketing Blog with EZ Rankings- Stay Tuned" />
<meta name="twitter:card" content="summary_large_image" />
<meta name="twitter:site" content="@ezRankings" />
<script type="application/ld+json" class="yoast-schema-graph">{
	    "@context": "https://schema.org",
	    "@graph": [
	        {
	            "@type": "CollectionPage",
	            "@id": "/blog/category/amazon-guide/",
	            "url": "/blog/category/amazon-guide/",
	            "name": "Amazon Guide for Beginners | Ultimate Amazon Strategies | Digital Marketing Blog with EZ Rankings- Stay Tuned",
	            "isPartOf": {
	                "@id": "/blog/#website"
	            },
	            "description": "Here are beginner's guides to Listing, selling & product optimization, keyword research, SEO, PPC, Social Media, Content strategies, Reviews, and more on Amazon.",
	            "breadcrumb": {
	                "@id": "/blog/category/amazon-guide/#breadcrumb"
	            },
	            "inLanguage": "en-US"
	        },
	        {
	            "@type": "BreadcrumbList",
	            "@id": "/blog/category/amazon-guide/#breadcrumb",
	            "itemListElement": [
	                {
	                    "@type": "ListItem",
	                    "position": 1,
	                    "name": "Home",
	                    "item": "/blog/"
	                },
	                {
	                    "@type": "ListItem",
	                    "position": 2,
	                    "name": "Amazon Guide"
	                }
	            ]
	        },
	        {
	            "@type": "WebSite",
	            "@id": "/blog/#website",
	            "url": "/blog/",
	            "name": "Digital Marketing Blog with EZ Rankings- Stay Tuned",
	            "description": "",
	            "publisher": {
	                "@id": "/blog/#organization"
	            },
	            "potentialAction": [
	                {
	                    "@type": "SearchAction",
	                    "target": {
	                        "@type": "EntryPoint",
	                        "urlTemplate": "/blog/?s={search_term_string}"
	                    },
	                    "query-input": {
	                        "@type": "PropertyValueSpecification",
	                        "valueRequired": true,
	                        "valueName": "search_term_string"
	                    }
	                }
	            ],
	            "inLanguage": "en-US"
	        },
	        {
	            "@type": "Organization",
	            "@id": "/blog/#organization",
	            "name": "Ez Rankings",
	            "url": "/blog/",
	            "logo": {
	                "@type": "ImageObject",
	                "inLanguage": "en-US",
	                "@id": "/blog/#/schema/logo/image/",
	                "url": "https://ezranking.s3.eu-west-2.amazonaws.com/ezrankings/blog/wp-content/uploads/2018/09/07121543/logo.png",
	                "contentUrl": "https://ezranking.s3.eu-west-2.amazonaws.com/ezrankings/blog/wp-content/uploads/2018/09/07121543/logo.png",
	                "width": 198,
	                "height": 65,
	                "caption": "Ez Rankings"
	            },
	            "image": {
	                "@id": "/blog/#/schema/logo/image/"
	            },
	            "sameAs": [
	                "https://www.facebook.com/ezrankingsIndia",
	                "https://x.com/ezRankings",
	                "https://www.instagram.com/ezrankingsitservices/",
	                "https://www.linkedin.com/company/ezrankingsindia/",
	                "https://www.pinterest.com/EzrankingsIndia/",
	                "https://www.youtube.com/c/EZRankingsIndia"
	            ]
	        }
	    ]
	}</script>
<!-- / Yoast SEO plugin. -->

yoast_head_json.title: Amazon Guide for Beginners | Ultimate Amazon Strategies | Digital Marketing Blog with EZ Rankings- Stay Tuned
yoast_head_json.og_title: Amazon Guide for Beginners | Ultimate Amazon Strategies | Digital Marketing Blog with EZ Rankings- Stay Tuned
yoast_head_json.og_description: Here are beginner's guides to Listing, selling & product optimization, keyword research, SEO, PPC, Social Media, Content strategies, Reviews, and more on Amazon.
yoast_head_json.og_site_name: Digital Marketing Blog with EZ Rankings- Stay Tuned

@graph.name: Amazon Guide for Beginners | Ultimate Amazon Strategies | Digital Marketing Blog with EZ Rankings- Stay Tuned
@graph.description: Here are beginner's guides to Listing, selling & product optimization, keyword research, SEO, PPC, Social Media, Content strategies, Reviews, and more on Amazon.

@graph.name: Digital Marketing Blog with EZ Rankings- Stay Tuned
